body:
This url base is getting mangled, presumably because of the date in the middle of the package filename.  Adding an explicit URL to the version line fixes it.

``` python
class Libedit(Package):
    """An autotools compatible port of the NetBSD editline library"""
    homepage = "http://thrysoee.dk/editline/"
    url      = "http://thrysoee.dk/editline/libedit-20150325-3.1.tar.gz"

    version('3.1', '43cdb5df3061d78b5e9d59109871b4f6')
```
title: URL rebuild in fetch mangling package
